query.esql:
FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) by type=github.security_advisory.type 
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT type ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) by type=github.security_advisory.type 
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT type ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) by type=github.security_advisory.type 
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT type ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.github_reviewed_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.github_reviewed_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.github_reviewed_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.updated_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.updated_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.ghsa_id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.updated_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY 
    severity_score=CASE(
        vulnerability.severity == "critical", 1,
        vulnerability.severity == "high", 2,
        vulnerability.severity == "medium", 3,
        vulnerability.severity == "low", 4,
        5
    ),
    vulnerability.severity
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT severity_score ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY 
    severity_score=CASE(
        vulnerability.severity == "critical", 1,
        vulnerability.severity == "high", 2,
        vulnerability.severity == "medium", 3,
        vulnerability.severity == "low", 4,
        5
    ),
    vulnerability.severity
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT severity_score ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY 
    severity_score=CASE(
        vulnerability.severity == "critical", 1,
        vulnerability.severity == "high", 2,
        vulnerability.severity == "medium", 3,
        vulnerability.severity == "low", 4,
        5
    ),
    vulnerability.severity
| WHERE count_distinct > 0
| SORT severity_score ASC

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.nvd_published_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.nvd_published_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| STATS count_distinct=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id) BY year = BUCKET(github.security_advisory.nvd_published_at, 1 year)

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_advisories=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id), count_packages=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.name
) BY github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem
| SORT count_advisories DESC, count_packages DESC
| KEEP github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem, count_advisories, count_packages

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_advisories=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id), count_packages=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.name
) BY github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem
| SORT count_advisories DESC, count_packages DESC
| KEEP github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem, count_advisories, count_packages

FROM logs-github.security_advisories-default
| WHERE github.security_advisory.type == "reviewed"
| STATS count_advisories=COUNT_DISTINCT(vulnerability.id), count_packages=COUNT_DISTINCT(github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.name
) BY github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem
| SORT count_advisories DESC, count_packages DESC
| KEEP github.security_advisory.vulnerabilities.package.ecosystem, count_advisories, count_packages
